select t1.buyid, (select dcodename from sy_ccodedtl where ccode = '014' and dcode = t1.buygubun) as dcodename, (select cityname from ba_citymst where citycode = t1.citycode) as cityname, (select boroughname from ba_citydtl where citycode = t1.citycode and boroughcode = t1.boroughcode) as boroughname, t1.address, t1.buym2, t1.buypy, (select sum(conm2) from sa_salemst where buyid = t1.buyid) as conm2, (select sum(conpy) from sa_salemst where buyid = t1.buyid) as conpy, t1.buym2 - (select sum(conm2) from sa_salemst where buyid = t1.buyid) as remnm2, t1.buypy - (select sum(conpy) from sa_salemst where buyid = t1.buyid) as remnpy, t1.buydanga from mm_buymst t1,
(select DISTINCT buyid from mm_payscheduletb where 1=1 and !(paygubun = '005' and payyn = 'Y')) t2
where 1=1
and t1.buygubun = #S_SALEGUBUN#
AND t1.citycode = #S_CITYCODE#
AND t1.boroughcode = #S_BOROUGHCODE#
AND t1.address LIKE '%$S_ADDRESS$%'
and t1.buyid = t2.buyid order by t1.citycode, t1.boroughcode asc
select (select branchname from ba_branchmst where branchcode = t1.branchcode) as OPENBRANCH from mm_salesopentb t1 where 1=1 and t1.buyid = #BUYID# order by t1.buyid asc
select remark as holding from mm_salesopentb t1 where 1=1 and t1.buyid = #BUYID# and t1.holdingyn = 'Y' order by t1.buyid asc
